name: Passion
description: This is a 100% vegetable/Pure Soybean oil candle that is perfect for your bedroom or where ever you would like a relaxing, mind-opening, romantic atmosphere. The custom image on this candle is accompanied by an overwhelming custom scent named Seduction; a carefully balanced combination of Ylang Ylang, Patchouli, and Rose ESSENTIAL OILS. Feel free to burn this candle for more than 32hrs then continue to enjoy your image by placing tea-light candles within the concave (even burn-down dependent on recommended burning times being followed). This will give you a hurricane affect you can have at anytime.

name: Memorial Sample
description: Memorialize loved ones at wakes and/or funerals with a custom candle made to order. Designs alongside scents can be requested and proofed via our customer contact link after purchase. Please include your return email and or telephone number for expedited processing.
